description: The victim was attacked near Rectory Road in Sittingbourne and is in a serious condition in hospital.
title: Sittingbourne woman, 19, charged over teenage boy's stabbing
title_page: Sittingbourne woman, 19, charged over teenage boy's stabbing - BBC News
maintext:
A 19-year-old woman has been charged with wounding with intent after a teenage boy was stabbed in Kent.
The victim, who is in his late teens, was attacked near Rectory Road, Sittingbourne, just after midnight on Thursday.
He was airlifted to a London hospital, where police said his condition was serious but stable.
The woman, who is from Sittingbourne, is due to appear before Medway magistrates on Friday.
